titleStmt.title: One blow at Babel in those of the people called Behmenites whose foundation is not upon that of the prophets ... but upon their own carnal conceptions begotten in their imaginations upon Jacob Behmen's writings &c. ... / by John Anderdon.
titleStmt.author: Anderdon, John, 1624?-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
